expo.name: Scanified
expo.description: Professional asset tracking and inventory management solution. Scan barcodes, track assets, manage inventory, and maintain compliance with comprehensive reporting tools.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Scanified uses your camera to scan asset barcodes for inventory management and tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Scanified may access your photo library to save scanned asset images for documentation purposes.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Scanified uses Face ID for secure and convenient login authentication.
infoPlist.NSBiometricUsageDescription: Scanified uses biometric authentication for secure and convenient login.

plugins.cameraPermission: Scanified uses your camera to scan asset barcodes for inventory management and tracking purposes.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Scanified uses Face ID for secure and convenient login authentication.
plugins.biometricPermission: Scanified uses biometric authentication for secure and convenient login.
